comments.body: what do you mean by "in the image"? We only want one per running instance clearly but I think itâ€™s not unreasonable and probably even desirable to have a single JAR that supports a fixed but non-singleton list of jdbc backends.
Or in a running instance, as you say.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@  * the options passed to json-api at startup.
